DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the ability of patients with intermediate risk of heart disease to appropriately use a Self-Management System.
DOC.brief_title: A 6-Month Consumer Behavior Study of a Self-Management System (0803-084)(COMPLETED)
DOC.detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 6 months.
DOC.criteria: Must be able to read and understand English without assistance. For Males: Minimum age 45 years and Maximum age N/A (No limit). For Females: Minimum age 55 years and Maximum age N/A (No limit). Pregnant or nursing Drug allergy
